participant_1.background:
I would love to learn how to play the guitar like the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
I am a good welder and have a knack for making new friends.
I have a rocking chair that I like to sit in while reading to my children.
I want to sell my paintings to make money.

participant_2.background:
I took George to the park for a picnic and we played fetch.
i am planning a trip to europe.
I'm not interested in sharing details about my personal life.
i work at a restaurant as waiter.
I once ate ice cream in my underwear in public, but then I realized people were staring at me, so I ran away.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the park and play fetch with my dog, George.
That sounds like fun! I like to paint and read.
I have a friend who loves to paint! I've never been able to get the hang of it though.
It's hard to learn, but it's really rewarding when you finish a painting you're proud of.
I'm sure it is. I'm more of a hands-on person. I like to build things.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of things do you build?
I like to build furniture and other things around the house. I'm also a pretty good welder.
That's awesome! I wish I was more handy. I'm pretty good at reading and writing, but I'm not very good at anything else.
I'm sure there's something you're good at! You just have to find it.
I hope so! I'm always looking for new things to try.
Well, if you ever want to come over and play fetch with George, you're welcome to.
Thanks! I might just take you up on that.
